name: places/ChIJARB--YVZwokRNOJrsNcBlNw
formattedAddress: 16 Prince St, New York, NY 10012, USA
adrFormatAddress: 16 Prince St, New York, NY 10012, USA

editorialSummary.text: High-end chain for stylish yet timeless clothing & accessories for men, women & children.

originalText.text:
I recently visited the Vince location in nolita and was genuinely awed by my experience. The distinct Vince aesthetic is truly exemplified in this beautiful, minimalist store. From the moment I walked in, I was greeted by an atmosphere of sophisticated elegance that perfectly captures the essence of the brand.

Brianna & her staff was incredibly welcoming, knowledgeable, and attentive without being overbearing. They offered insightful advice on their collection, helping me find the perfect pieces that align with my personal style. Their deep understanding of Vince's clothing line and the current trends made my shopping experience easy and enjoyable.

originalText.text: Had a recent fashion event in the heart of New York City. Traveled from Miami. I stopped by Vince to browse around and felt like I was back home! Brianna and her staff were amazing. The team was exceptional and helped my style out a bunch of new outfits. Little do you know, I left the store with a brand new fall wardrobe.  Top notch experience and left the store feeling chic. Thank you again Brianna.

Thank you again Brianna.

originalText.text:
I have walked past this store countless times over the years but have never wandered in until this weekend and I’m so glad I did!

Everyone working there seemed friendly and warm, which isn’t always the case with a lot of stores/brands. Shoutout to Lesley who helped me pick out an outfit I’m deeply obsessed with and for helping me when I called a few days later about a credit card question! Thank you Prince St Vince, I’ll be back soon!!

originalText.text:
This is my favorite Vince store to shop at anytime I visit SOHO.
In a nutshell: nice selection, clean space, and excellent staff!

originalText.text: Leslie was amazing! She gave really great feedback and solutions (as a fellow short girl).
